nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_429
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I have decided to accept the new post, even though the job is not very well paid.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_430
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The job has been taken to be very simple until (it is) actually started.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_431
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Now that you are planning to move to Canada, you must try to adjust to cold weather in winter.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_432
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He promised to help us to buy the house, but with a little reluctance.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_433
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: This is an important meeting. Please see to it that you are not late for it.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_434
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He is an experienced businessman who has engaged in foreign trade for quite a few years.
